title: Women climbing mountains
creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School and Lois Ellis
brief_description: A tribute to sculptor Henry Moore and contemporary woman’s search for new horizons. Features dance work on film choreographed by Margaret Barr with dancers Christina Cullen, Lin Kan and Jim MacLaine. No commentary.
